name: Stick-man Swing Adventure: Tight Rope And Fly
name_original: Stick-man Swing Adventure: Tight Rope And Fly
description:
Use your ropes to swing stickman from one skyscraper to another. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Then land on the Red Target to finish the level. Lots of different power ups to help you get past that tough level. 

FEATURES:

• Play in the rain, sunrise, daytime and night time
• Universal app, play in HD on any iOS device, including iPads
• Tight and fast paced gameplay
• Amazing looking doodle graphics
• Stickman gets thrown around like a rag doll
• Share your scores on Facebook or Twitter
• Supports GameCenter


Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible, we love to hear your suggestion!
